summary: This mod adds graveyards and burialsites around skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][i][color=#8DB3E2][font=Courier][b][SIZE=7][u]Skyrim Graveyards[/u][/SIZE][/b][/font][/color][/i]

[font=Verdana][b][color=#CCC1D9][size=3]This is my second mod so be nice :)
This mod adds graveyards around Skyrim.

It would be nice if some could upload screenshots from their own game.
If you like it dont forget to endorse and ofc comment thank you![/size][/color][/b][/font]

[size=3][url=http://www.youtube.com/user/robinovicable?feature=watch][b]Video by Robiehn Vidhs[/b][/url][i][/i][u][/u][/size]
[youtube]iOX4im-k-j8[/youtube]
[font=Verdana][b][color=#CCC1D9][size=3]This is from version 1.6[/size][/color][/b][/font]

[color=#7F7F7F][SIZE=7][i][b]___________________________________[/b][/i][/SIZE][/color][/COLOR]
[color=#8DB3E2][size=5][b][font=Courier][u]Worklist[/u][/font][/b][/size][/color]


[color=#8DB3E2][size=5][b][font=Courier][u]Misc[/u][/font][/b][/size][/color]
[color=#00B050][size=3][i][b]Lootable Graves - Done
"Hidden" Dungeons - Done
More Details - Done
Readable graves - Done
Real light from candles - Done
Optional - Done[/b][/i][/size][/color]
[size=3][i][b]People (Guards/Civilians)
Enemies[/b][/i][/size]

[color=#8DB3E2][size=5][b][font=Courier][u]Villages/Settlements[/u][/font][/b][/size][/color]
[size=3][i][b][color=#00B050]Helgen - Done
Rorikstead - Done
Dawnstar - Done
Morthal - Done
Ivarstead - Done
Dragon Bridge - Done[/color]([color=#E36C09][u]NOT included in Optional[/u][/color])
[color=#00B050]Karthwasten - Done
Shor's Stone - Done
Kynesgrove- Done
Darkwater Crossing - Done
Stonehills - Done
Riverwood - Done[/color]
[color=#C00000]Winterhold - on Hold
Falkreath - on Hold[/color][/b][/i][/size]

[color=#8DB3E2][size=5][b][font=Courier][u]Orc Bases[/u][/font][/b][/size][/color]
[size=3][i][b][color=#00B050]Dushnikh Yal - Done
Largashbur - Done
Mor Khazgur - Done[/color][/b][/i][/size]

[color=#8DB3E2][size=5][b][font=Courier][u]Cities[/u][/font][/b][/size][/color]
[size=3][i][b][color=#C00000]Riften - on Hold
Solitude - on Hold
Whiterun - on Hold
Windhelm - on Hold
Markarth - on Hold[/color][/b][/i][/size]
[color=#7F7F7F][SIZE=7][i][b]___________________________________[/b][/i][/SIZE][/color][/COLOR]

[color=#8DB3E2][size=5][b][font=Courier][u]Compatibility and Requirements[/u][/font][/b][/size][/color]

[font=Verdana][b][color=#CCC1D9][size=3]Updated Skyrim to latest is recommended.
The mod is not compatible with anything that modifies the same Cell and/or Area.
This mod should be compatible with texture mods.[/size][/color][/b][/font]

[color=#8DB3E2][size=4][b][font=Courier]SOUTH DRAGON BRIDGE - Fight Against the Thalmor IV the Optional Only![/font][/b][/size][/color]

[color=#8DB3E2][size=4][b][font=Courier]Mainfile is Compatible with ETAC[/font][/b][/size][/color] [color=#C00000][size=5][b][font=Courier]ONLY[/font][/b][/size][/color] [color=#8DB3E2][size=4][b][font=Courier]if you use the[/font][/b][/size] [b][color=#00B050][size=4][i]"Modular"[/i][/size][/color][/b] [color=#8DB3E2][size=4][b]version.[/b][/size][/color][/color]

[size=3][i][b][color=#C00000]Rorikstead - Conflict[/color][/b][/i]
[i][b][color=#C00000]Darkwater Crossing - Conflict[/color][/b][/i]
[i][b][color=#00B050]Dragon Bridge - Compatible[/color][/b][/i]
[i][b][color=#00B050]Kynesgrove - "Compatible"[/color][/b][/i]
[i][b][color=#00B050]Riverwood - Compatible[/color][/b][/i]
[i][b][color=#00B050]Morthal - Compatible[/color][/b][/i]
[i][b][color=#00B050]Dawnstar - Compatible[/color][/b][/i]
[i][b][color=#00B050]Falkreath - Compatible[/color][/b][/i]
[i][b][color=#00B050]Ivarstead - Compatible[/color][/b][/i][/size]
[color=#7F7F7F][SIZE=7][i][b]___________________________________[/b][/i][/SIZE][/color][/COLOR]

author: bjs_336

files.name: Skyrim Graveyards
files.changelogHtml:
Remade all the navmesh on all the graveyards.
Removed floating objects.
Added lootable graves to almost every graveyard.
Added three instances to three graveyards
Added more details to a few graveyards.
Remade Stonehills ruin resting place.
Remade Shore Stone's graveyard.
Remade the Refugees Rest.
Remade Hamvir's Rest.
Reintroduced the Whiterun Graveyard in a new location as an "unmarked place".
Remade Helgen Graveyard.

files.name: Skyrim Graveyards Optional - SOUTH DRAGON BRIDGE - Fight Against the Thalmor IV
files.fileName: Skyrim Graveyards Optional - SOUTH DRAGON BRIDGE - Fight Against the Thalmor IV-32148-2-1-1.rar
files.changelogHtml: Fixed a clipping through the tomb door in Stonehills.

files.name: Skyrim Graveyards Optional 2 - Script FREE
files.changelogHtml: Removed all scripts from the mod.
